name: language-generic-config
author: Lee Dohm <lee@lee-dohm.com>
description: Provides basic syntax highlighting for configuration files that are just composed of comments or non-comments

automatchEnabled.description: When opening a file without a known filetype, assign the `generic-config` grammar if the file contains comment-like sequences.

automatchPattern.description: A regular expression that dictates what a “comment-like sequence” is.

requireMinimumMatchingLines.description: Limit automatching to files containing at least *`N`* lines which match `automatchPattern`.
